name: Fables; Exemplum de Tribus Latronibus; Defensio Curatorum Adversus Fratres Mendicantes, 1357; De Balsamo (Ch. 7 of De Mirabilibus); homilies on the Gospel of Luke; De septem sacramentis; and others
maker: Unknown, Aesop, and Pope Clement V, et al
description: Fables; Exemplum de Tribus Latronibus; Defensio Curatorum Adversus Fratres Mendicantes, 1357; De Balsamo (Ch. 7 of De Mirabilibus); homilies on the Gospel of Luke; De septem sacramentis; and others; Unknown, Aesop (Greek, early 6th century - possibly 564 B.C.), and Pope Clement V (French, 1264 - 1314), et al; Trier (probably), Germany; third quarter of 15th century; Pen and black ink and colored washes on paper bound between original wood boards covered with pigskin; Leaf: 28.7 × 20.6 cm (11 5/16 × 8 1/8 in.); Ms. Ludwig XV 1; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
title: Fables; Exemplum de Tribus Latronibus; Defensio Curatorum Adversus Fratres Mendicantes, 1357; De Balsamo (Ch. 7 of De Mirabilibus); homilies on the Gospel of Luke; De septem sacramentis; and others
